At the start of your Command phase, you can select Devastator Doctrine, Tactical Doctrine or Assault Doctrine. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Combat Doctrine is active and its effects apply to all ADEPTUS ASTARTES units from your army. You can only select each Combat Doctrine once per battle.

This unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.
